TextView.android:text: \t\tNote: These are short descriptions of rituals commonly known in-game. Additional rituals exist but you must discover them in game. Many rituals have additional powers beyond those listed in summary!
Creates a Psionics Circle which allows investees to identify mind altering effects.
Replaces Mind Meld, allows for the creation of “mental worlds” inside your minds.
Plant the paranoid fear of one target into another target chosen by a shaper.
A 10 ft. circle which blinds demonic, angelic or possessed creatures.
A Psionic blade that always swings 5 magic and can only spellstrike Psionic battle magic.
Coin flip's chance to remember your death.
Extends the duration of Psionics rituals by 3 months per stack, max 12 months.
1/ever manipulate 1 object OR 1/ever Ritual Telekinesis Push 5 Strength.
Investees may become ethereal inside the circle for a short time each day.
Summons an Angel/Demon killing blade with special abilities.
The Psi-weapon may now spellstrike any core sphere, stacking allows for frag sphere.
The Psi-weapon may now spellstrike any core sphere, stacking allows for frag sphere.
Erases one person, item, location, or event of the caster’s choosing which can then be replaced.
Seeds an idea which the target will spend all time and effort to complete.
Creates a psionic creature which hunts a target until it is destroyed.
Grants the investees a 1/event Power Word Area Confusion.
Allows the caster add the Ritual prefix to a single Psionics battle magic spell 1/day.
Allows your Psi-weapon to assume different weapon types like Large or Exotic.
Forces the target to blindly follow a single verbal command given by the caster.
Restores all memories removed through alchemy, chemistry, magic and rituals.
Restores all memories removed through alchemy, chemistry, magic and rituals.
Caster can deflect spell packets with the Psi-weapon at the cost of 3 arcane body per.
Adds 1 year to the duration of Psionics rituals.
Grants investees 1/event Power Word Area Fear, those in circle or invested are immune.
Your Psi-weapon gains a buff based upon the emotion chosen.
Hold out your fist and slowly crush your target with Massive damage.
A more powerful version of the Lesser Angel/Demon Blade.
Turns 1/ever Psionics ritual effects into 1/day effects.
Turns the caster into a powerful Psionic Warrior for 1 hour.
Buffs your Psi-weapon with a buff based upon the Plane chosen.
The target may not lie but is not forced to speak.
1 Power Word Area Ritual Exorcism and 3 packet-delivered Ritual Exorcisms.
Investees may become immune to mind-altering effects for 1 hour.
3 arrows that pulse BM onto the target, hard to remove.
Become manifested ghost-like form for 10 minutes, can only be hurt with Psionics magic.
Caster may take a single battle magic or Ritual spell that has hit them and cast it themselves.
Turns a Psionics ritual circle into a hoop for easy transport.
Augment Psionic Weapon: Mind Over Matter
